topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54089b3963687222b12a0200#post_54089b3963687222b12a0200
There are currently 8 parts, Focused on a different cast of characters each time. The Anime is currently on part 3, "Stardust crusaders" Which is where the formula started to set in, I still say you should check out Phantom blood and Battle tendency as they're still really good. (The first two parts don't have stands)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54089b3963687222b12a0200#post_54089b3963687222b12a0200
The manga, despite it's size, is actually pretty quick to get through.
